import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
plt.style.use("Solarize_Light2")
%matplotlib inline
hotel_booking=pd.read_csv('../input/hotel-booking/hotel_booking.csv')
source.b6c4ab18:
fig=plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
ax=fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax.set_xlim(0,30)
ax.set_ylim(0,2)
sns.kdeplot(data=hotel_booking,x='stays_in_week_nights', label='stays_in_week_nights',color='r')
sns.kdeplot(data=hotel_booking,x='stays_in_weekend_nights',label='stays_in_weekend_nights',color='b')
plt.legend()
source.489850be:
fig=plt.figure(figsize=(5,3))
ax=fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
sns.violinplot(data=hotel_booking, x='is_canceled', y='company',hue='hotel',gridsize=100, width=0.8,)
plt.legend(loc=(1.02,0))
